name: Flirting With Death (Ver: 0.1)
description:
A very very short cut of a visual novel that StuffyMuffin and I have been working on for this summer My First Game Jam!

Writing: Vince (StuffyMuffin)

Art and Programming: Jaime (Potatofuzz)

Music: Nick

Flirting With Death aka "All The King's Horsemen: Flirting With Death -- Super Kiss Monster Love Ultra; Arcade Edition", a dating sim where Famine, Pestilence, and War try to set up their fourth horseman of the apocalypse, Death, with monster girls they think she'd like. With vibrant and clashing personalities, will everything work out? Who will Death end up with? Will she stop yelling at everyone all the time? Will Pestilence make more horrid puns?

Update 4/9/2017:

Hey, Vince here. I know a couple of you have asked so I'm gonna do a short update. Jaime and I have been working on the game but it's been slow given other creative projects/life stuff (school related stuff for Jaime and me starting a new job). We discuss what we want to do with Flirting w/ Death often but don't always get a chance to work on it.

The concrete stuff;

-the game's first chapter is finished and we've moved on to the individual routes

-the endings have been fully outlined and we're working with the idea of not having set good/bad/neutral endings. Instead we're looking at doing two endings for each character with their own overarching theme instead of a concrete "you got the good end/you got the bad end" etc.

The not concrete stuff;

-We're not sure when this is gonna be done. It all depends on how our lives end up. We spit-balled summer 2018 but who knows when it'll actually be. This is the first long term project either of us has worked on so it's a little daunting.

Thanks for your patience with all this. As always you can get in touch with Jaime on Twitter @potatofuzz and myself @AStuffyMuffin

Thank you again,

Vince
